dmca.title: cease and desist
dmca.body:
Hello,
I am asking you to take down my music off of your site.  "Tranquility Collection" and "A North Country Christmas" by Sharon Drury.  I am the composer and producer of the music and you do not have my permission to sell or give away my music as it is copyrighted by me.  

Please respond immediately.  I do not belong to any organizations where you could license my music,  so if you say you have paid for licenses through some Russian Federation FAIR, that does not include my music.

Thank you for your immediate attention,
Sharon Drury composer pianist
